snippets.excerpt: Underwater city built in air bubbles created by ancient magic. Inhabitants are amphibious or use breathing enchantments. Trade happens through water portals. Light comes from bioluminescent sea life. Pressure changes affect magic.
snippets.conflict_hook: Air bubbles are failing. Ancient magic is fading. City must find new power source or relocate. Surface dwellers want to exploit the magic. Sea monsters are drawn to the failing barriers.

snippets.excerpt: Desert oasis that moves with the seasons, following underground water currents. Nomads track it using ancient star charts. The oasis appears in different locations each year. Those who find it first control trade routes for the season.
snippets.conflict_hook: Oasis has stopped moving. Water is running out. Nomads blame each other for breaking ancient pacts. A hidden force is controlling the water. Finding the truth requires following the old star charts.

snippets.excerpt: Floating forest where trees grow on clouds, roots hanging in the air. Paths are made of living vines that shift. Gravity is inconsistent. Some areas float, others fall. Inhabitants use gliders and climbing gear. Weather magic is common.
snippets.conflict_hook: Forest is sinking. Cloud magic is failing. Trees are dying. Inhabitants must find new cloud source or relocate. Ground-dwellers see opportunity to harvest the falling trees. Weather mages are in high demand.

snippets.excerpt: Volcanic forge-city built into active volcano. Lava flows power magical forges. Inhabitants are fire-resistant or use protective magic. Metalwork is legendary. The volcano's mood affects production. Eruptions are both danger and opportunity.
snippets.conflict_hook: Volcano is becoming unstable. Forges are too hot, production is failing. Some want to tame it with magic, others to abandon it. Ancient fire spirits are awakening. The volcano itself seems sentient.
rp_cues: fire is both tool and threat

snippets.excerpt: Tundra trading post where seasons determine what's available. Summer brings traders from south, winter brings northern nomads. The post is built on permafrost that's starting to melt. Ancient ice preserves secrets and dangers.
snippets.conflict_hook: Permafrost melting reveals ancient city. Some want to excavate, others to preserve. Melting releases ancient creatures. Trading routes are disrupted. Climate change threatens the post's existence.
